item.title: First post
item.description: Hello there Hi everyone, this will be my first post on this blog, and first post using hugo, I’m really terrible at hugo, cause well… uhhh… Yeah… But it’s working now which is all that matters. I hope to post a decent bit, my first proper post will be about how I made an AI voice for one of my teachers, it’s a good story. Anyways, that’s it for now, see you in the next post!
item.content:
Hello there

Hi everyone, this will be my first post on this blog, and first post using hugo, I’m really terrible at hugo, cause well… uhhh…

Yeah… But it’s working now which is all that matters.

I hope to post a decent bit, my first proper post will be about how I made an AI voice for one of my teachers, it’s a good story.

Anyways, that’s it for now, see you in the next post!
